20110127040009.000|20110127040011.000|TR0|360, "Keeping Them Honest", a coin company 
20110127040011.000|20110127040013.000|TR0|profiting off 9/11.  Are their 
20110127040013.000|20110127040015.000|TR0|commemorative coins a scam?  The company 
20110127040015.000|20110127040017.000|TR0|is being accused of making false claims

20110127040020.000|20110127040022.000|TR0|they say they used silver from Ground

20110127040059.000|20110127040101.000|TR0|We begin, though, as always, "Keeping Them 
20110127040101.000|20110127040103.000|TR0|Honest" with a company profiting off the 
20110127040103.000|20110127040105.000|TR0|horror of 9/11, and doing it in a way that 
20110127040105.000|20110127040107.000|TR0|some lawmakers and survivors say is false 
20110127040107.000|20110127040110.000|TR0|and abhorrent.
20110127040110.000|20110127040112.000|TR0|
20110127040112.000|20110127040114.000|TR0|Now, maybe you've seen the ads or looked 
20110127040114.000|20110127040116.000|TR0|at the Web site.  Here it is. It's called 
20110127040116.000|20110127040118.000|TR0|the National Collector's Mint.  They're 
20110127040118.000|20110127040121.000|TR0|selling coins -- here's one of them -- 
20110127040121.000|20110127040123.000|TR0|billed as the -- the official 
20110127040123.000|20110127040125.000|TR0|first-responders 10th anniversary World 
20110127040125.000|20110127040127.000|TR0|Trade Center commemorative.
20110127040127.000|20110127040129.000|TR0|

20110127040131.000|20110127040134.000|TR0|which they claim was actually recovered 
20110127040134.000|20110127040136.000|TR0|from Ground Zero, "from the vaults beneath 
20110127040136.000|20110127040138.000|TR0|the ashes of Ground Zero" is the exact 
20110127040138.000|20110127040140.000|TR0|wording.  They sell these coins for $29.95 
20110127040140.000|20110127040142.000|TR0|and the company bills them as never 
20110127040142.000|20110127040144.000|TR0|released for circulation, available only 
20110127040144.000|20110127040147.000|TR0|to collectors.
20110127040147.000|20110127040149.000|TR0|

20110127040151.000|20110127040153.000|TR0|9/11 Memorial Museum is issuing coins to

20110127040349.000|20110127040351.000|TR0|and silver, 14 milligrams each.  It sounds 
20110127040351.000|20110127040353.000|TR0|precise, sounds scientific, but what's a 
20110127040353.000|20110127040355.000|TR0|milligram? Well, it's one thousandth of a 
20110127040355.000|20110127040357.000|TR0|gram.  So, that's about fourteen- 
20110127040357.000|20110127040359.000|TR0|thousandth of a gram of gold and silver.
20110127040359.000|20110127040402.000|TR0|
20110127040402.000|20110127040404.000|TR0|And what about the claim about the silver 
20110127040404.000|20110127040406.000|TR0|coming from the Ground Zero vaults?  It

20110127040434.000|20110127040437.000|TR0|grade citing numerous complaints and 
20110127040437.000|20110127040439.000|TR0|failures to respond to even simple 
20110127040439.000|20110127040441.000|TR0|requests for information from Better

20110127040849.000|20110127040851.000|TR0|DEPARTMENT CAPTAIN:  Yes, Mr. Cooper.  
20110127040851.000|20110127040853.000|TR0|Thank you very much for having me on the 
20110127040853.000|20110127040856.000|TR0|program.
20110127040856.000|20110127040858.000|TR0|
20110127040858.000|20110127040900.000|TR0|Good evening, Congressman Nadler.
20110127040900.000|20110127040902.000|TR0|
20110127040902.000|20110127040904.000|TR0|NADLER:  Good evening.
20110127040904.000|20110127040907.000|TR0|
20110127040907.000|20110127040909.000|TR0|DEPRISCO:  Back in October of 2001, we 
20110127040909.000|20110127040911.000|TR0|were well aware of the location of this 
20110127040911.000|20110127040913.000|TR0|vault that was owned and managed by the 
20110127040913.000|20110127040915.000|TR0|Bank of Nova Scotia underneath Four World 
20110127040915.000|20110127040917.000|TR0|Trade Center.
20110127040917.000|20110127040920.000|TR0|
20110127040920.000|20110127040922.000|TR0|Well, part of my job was, as a 
20110127040922.000|20110127040924.000|TR0|representative of the Office of Emergency 
20110127040924.000|20110127040926.000|TR0|Management, was to coordinate a retrieval 
20110127040926.000|20110127040928.000|TR0|and recovery plan to remove all the 
20110127040928.000|20110127040930.000|TR0|contents of that vault, to move it from 
20110127040930.000|20110127040933.000|TR0|the Ground Zero area over to another 
20110127040933.000|20110127040935.000|TR0|location, which at that time was another 
20110127040935.000|20110127040937.000|TR0|vault in Brooklyn.
20110127040937.000|20110127040939.000|TR0|
20110127040939.000|20110127040941.000|TR0|(CROSSTALK)
20110127040941.000|20110127040944.000|TR0|
20110127040944.000|20110127040946.000|TR0|COOPER:  So, what about these ads make you 
20110127040946.000|20110127040948.000|TR0|so angry?
20110127040948.000|20110127040950.000|TR0|
20110127040950.000|20110127040952.000|TR0|DEPRISCO:  Well, you know, I lost friends 
20110127040952.000|20110127040954.000|TR0|and colleagues on 9/11.  I worked down at 
20110127040954.000|20110127040957.000|TR0|Ground Zero for 14 months.  I was heavily 
20110127040957.000|20110127040959.000|TR0|involved with much of the recovery 
20110127040959.000|20110127041001.000|TR0|operations.  I worked with a great team of 
20110127041001.000|20110127041003.000|TR0|people with OEM and other city agencies.
20110127041003.000|20110127041005.000|TR0|
20110127041005.000|20110127041007.000|TR0|And just to -- to hear -- I have heard
